1.title: The egg that has escaped the carton
1.plot: Episode 1: 'An egg that has escaped from the carton'. Deirdre (12 years old) makes up a story on the spot. Everything she says turnes into a movie: An egg escapes from the carton and ends up in the forest. The egg is looking for friendship but comes across a mean blackbird and a sexy fox that want to eat him. The egg wants to be eaten but not before he knows what it's like to have real friendship. Will he find true friendship or should he have stayed in the carton? (Deirdre's words are visualized literally, including uhhhh, uhmmmmm... and other slips of the tongue).

2.title: A Fat Ballerina Man Who Gets Taserd by His Grandma
2.plot: A 'fat ballerina man' is in a ballet class with cute little girls. He's not good and wants to quit. But his grandma won't let him. Grandma threatens him and uses her taser to keep him in class. How did grandma get a hold of a taser? And will he be free at last or will he stay the fat ballerina man amongst little pink ballerinas forever?

3.title: French fries Henk likes to humiliate himself and falls in love with Ketchup Henkelina
3.plot: Episode 3: 'French fries Henk likes to humiliate himself and falls in love with Ketchup Henkelina'. Luna (12 years old) makes up a story on the spot. Everything she says turns into a movie: A costumer orders French fries at a snack bar. But when he's outside French Fries Henk escapes. French Fries Henk does a lot of things for no reason and likes to humiliate himself. One day French Fries Henk is imitating John Mayer to earn some money. And then he meets Ketchup Henkelina. And they fall in love. Will they stay together forever? Or will their relationship end on their ...

4.title: The Painting That Escapes from the Museum to Look for Its Painter
4.plot: A painting (of an apple, banana, cherry and pineapple) is made fun of by children and escapes from the museum. He wants to go look for its painter. But Vincent van Gogh turns out to be dead. The painting shares some secrets about van Gogh because they had spent a lot of time together. Does the painting survive the escape or will the apple, banana, cherry and pineapple get into a fight and split up?

5.title: A Grease Kid of Guy Cuts His Long Hair and the Cut Off Strand of Hair Starts Its Own Life
5.plot: A Grease kind of guy has really long hair and cuts it off because his friends tell him to. The cut off strand of hair ends up in the waste basket. He escapes, gets chased by cats and dogs, falls in the sink and walks around like James Bond. Will he make it on his own or will he reunite with his owner?

6.title: The Silly Inventor Who Builds Women Because He Is Lonely and Destroys Them Because He Is Bored
6.plot: A silly inventor gets dumped in the desert by his parents. He grows up lonely. And decides to build women out of sand. Once they are done he chooses one and destroys the rest. After a while he gets bored with the woman he chose and dumps her and starts over again. Until one day a milkshake he invented makes him rich and then he meets a model. They kiss for 5 seconds. Will the inventor finally find true love? Or will he end up all by himself in the desert?

7.title: A Grandma Gets Bullied in Her Knitting Club
7.plot: A grandma gets bullied at her knitting club. Because the other old ladies are jealous of her new grand child on the way. When grandma gets the call that her grandchild is born, she rushes to the hospital. There she finds out that her grandchild is a traffic cone. Will she welcome the traffic cone into her family or toss it out of the window?
